Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (employee != null) {  	// Provide 10% pay raise  	employee.Income *= 1.10;  	Console.WriteLine ("{0} {1}'s new income: {2:C}"' employee.GetType ().Name' employee.Name' employee.Income);  }
